医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肥胖与学龄女孩肌肉骨骼疼痛加剧有关伦敦玛丽女王大学的研究表明，与体重健康的儿童相比，肥胖的女孩更容易出现骨骼、关节、肌肉、韧带或肌腱疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Obesity-linked-to-increased-musculoskeletal-pain-in-school-age-girls.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Obesity-linked-to-increased-musculoskeletal-pain-in-school-age-girls.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bcf01ce-2c02-4b78-8c6e-184b19eeeea3 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 23:58:00 -0400 Obesity linked to increased musculoskeletal pain in school-age girls
柠檬苹果多酚提取物在 IBD 肝损伤研究中表现出色“柠檬酒”苹果多酚提取物 (LAPE) 在炎症性肠病 (IBD) 小鼠模型中显示出减少肝脏和肠道炎症的前景，凸显了潜在的自然治疗途径https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Limoncella-apple-polyphen-extract-shines-in-IBD-liver-damage-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Limoncella-apple-polyphen-extract-shines-in-IBD-liver-damage-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87272690-f78f-43a3-94fc-82e3e4b9b073 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 23:52:00 -0400 Limoncella apple polyphenol extract shines in IBD liver damage study
黄体酮比宫颈子宫托更能有效降低严重早产的风险怀孕 20 周左右子宫颈较短的女性早产的风险会增加。预防子宫颈短的孕妇早产是保护孩子健康的关键一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Progesterone-more-efficient-than-a-cervical-pessary-at-reducing-the-risk-of-severe-preterm-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Progesterone-more-efficient-than-a-cervical-pessary-at-reducing-the-risk-of-severe-preterm-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89298547-2e61-43b4-919f-5db44df00a1d Tue, 12 Mar 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Progesterone more effective than cervical pessary at reducing the risk of severe preterm birth
研究显示超过80%的肺结核患者没有持续性咳嗽超过 80% 的肺结核（世界上最致命的感染）患者没有持续咳嗽，尽管这被视为该疾病的一个关键症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/More-than-8025-of-病人-with-tuberculosis-do-not-have-persistent-cough-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/More-than-8025-of-病人-with-tuberculosis-do-not-have-persistent-cough-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88d9dc17-2f52-49d1-bec3-5de5439e1ffc Tue, 12 Mar 2024 23:30:27 -0400 More than 80% of patients with tuberculosis do not have persistent cough, study shows
怀孕期间使用对乙酰氨基酚与儿童语言发育迟缓有关怀孕期间增加使用对乙酰氨基酚与儿童潜在的语言发展问题有关，强调需要谨慎并进一步研究其产前影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Acetaminophen-use-in-pregnancy-linked-to-childrens-language-delays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Acetaminophen-use-in-pregnancy-linked-to-childrens-language-delays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2d76071-173a-4723-afe2-393f23fea850 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Acetaminophen use in pregnancy linked to children's language delays
新研究强调撒哈拉以南非洲地区迫切需要伤寒疫苗接种根据《柳叶刀全球健康》今天发表的一项新研究，撒哈拉以南非洲国家的伤寒负担很重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/New-study-highlights-the-urgent-need-for-typhoid-vaccination-in-sub-Saharan-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/New-study-highlights-the-urgent-need-for-typhoid-vaccination-in-sub-Saharan-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4f07275-7d09-428e-a8f0-bd264b8ac3b6 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 23:25:37 -0400 New study highlights the urgent need for typhoid vaccination in sub-Saharan Africa
研究发现地中海饮食与更丰富的肠道多样性有关研究发现地中海饮食增加了健康个体肠道微生物群的多样性，从而深入了解其健康益处，包括改善心血管健康和降低疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-richer-gut-diversity-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-richer-gut-diversity-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dea03384-1f76-4e71-affb-900c8a1eaa46 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 23:08:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet linked to richer gut diversity, study finds
追踪猴痘病毒：利用古猩猩 DNA 调查 1965 年鹿特丹动物园的疫情爆发对博物馆保存的猩猩牙齿的古代 DNA 分析揭示了 1965 年荷兰动物园爆发的猴痘病毒 (MPXV) 感染的原因，展示了博物馆组学技术在追踪历史病毒传播方面的力量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Tracing-Monkeypox-virus-Leveraging-ancient-orangutan-DNA-to-investigate-the-1965-Rotterdam-Zoo-outbreak.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Tracing-Monkeypox-virus-Leveraging-ancient-orangutan-DNA-to-investigate-the-1965-Rotterdam-Zoo-outbreak.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=211e6255-2ea9-4762-a410-9e42a0121828 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 22:54:00 -0400 Tracing Monkeypox virus: Leveraging ancient orangutan DNA to investigate the 1965 Rotterdam Zoo outbreak
发酵植物饮料在乳制品替代市场中激发健康益处植物性饮料的发酵可提高其营养价值、生物活性和感官特性，提供健康益处并作为可行的乳制品替代品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Fermented-plant-drinks-stir-up-health-benefits-in-dairy-alternative-market.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Fermented-plant-drinks-stir-up-health-benefits-in-dairy-alternative-market.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ccecac7-2e6a-46fd-822f-0f8c6d5d9f87 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 22:47:00 -0400 Fermented plant drinks stir up health benefits in dairy alternative market
协作护理干预为癌症患者节省成本并带来健康益处匹兹堡大学医学院研究人员领导的一项研究表明，接受专门心理健康支持作为治疗计划一部分的癌症患者更有可能看到生活质量的改善以及疼痛、抑郁和疲劳的减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Collaborative-care-intervention-provides-cost- savings-and-health-benefits-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Collaborative-care-intervention-provides-cost- savings-and-health-benefits-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=486e3730-f316-456a-9fb4-f99192b8676c Tue, 12 Mar 2024 22:46:12 -0400 Collaborative care intervention provides cost savings and health benefits for cancer patients
